titles.title: Recognizing the service of the Gold Star Dads of America, a nonprofit organization consisting of the fathers of members of the Armed Forces who make the ultimate sacrifice in defense of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 3/7/2012--Introduced. Recognizes and supports the efforts of the Gold Star Dads of America (fathers of members of the Armed Forces who die in defense of the United States) to assist members who suffer catastrophic injuries while serving on active duty and to assist the families of such members.
